name: Upstairs Hallway
longDesc:
You are in the upstairs hallway.
When you exit the attic, you are on the south wall.
There are stairs in front of you, on the north wall.
To your left, on the west wall, is your parents' bedroom.
On the east wall there is your bedroom, and the bathroom.
Between your bedroom and the bathroom is a recycling bin filled to the top with seltzer cans.
Next to the door to your parents' room is an exercise ball and your mom's purse.
You need to look in the recycling bin to get the aluminum can.
You need to bounce on the exercise ball to open your parents' door.
You can look in your mom's purse, but you can't take anything out of it because she'll know you've been in there.
description:
You are in the upstairs hallway.
When you exit the attic, you are on the south wall.
There are stairs in front of you, on the north wall.
To your left, on the west wall, is your parents' bedroom.
On the east wall there is your bedroom, and the bathroom.

recycling bin.name: recycling bin
recycling bin.description: The recycling bin is full of seltzer cans.
recycling bin.discoveryStatement: You'll need one of these cans

purse.name: purse
purse.description: Your mom's purse is gigantic. If you jump in you might get lost. Better not take anything or you might get caught.

exercise ball.name: exercise ball
exercise ball.description: The giant blue exercise ball that your dad uses instead of a desk chair.

aluminum can.name: aluminum can
aluminum can.description: Partially crushed seltzer can from a brand you cannot pronounce. There are 100 just like it in the recycling bin.
